name: Kubernetes - Collection Healthcheck V3 (otelcol)
description: The Kubernetes - Collection Health Check dashboard displays collection status from otel components in the Kubernetes cluster.
title: Kubernetes - Collection Healthcheck V3 (otelcol)

queries.queryString: cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}}  pod=*-sumologic-* metric=otelcol_process_cpu_seconds (pod=*trace* or pod=*instrumentation* )| rate | quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod

cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} metric= otelcol_process_memory_rss (pod=*trace* or pod=*instrumentation* )
| quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} metric= otelcol_otelsvc_k8s_pod_deleted  |count
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} metric= otelcol_exporter_queue_size (pod=*trace* or pod=*instrumentation* ) | quantize 1m using avg  | avg by container, pod | sum by pod
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} metric= otelcol_otelsvc_k8s_pod_added   |  count

panels.title: Untitled
panels.text:
# What does Red Indicate?

### If one of the panels goes red, it means that Prometheus was unable to scrape from that endpoint. This will result in some set of metrics not being visible inside of Sumo Logic.

queries.queryString: cluster={{cluster}} metric=up  | quantize  2m |  sum
cluster={{cluster}} metric=up  | quantize  2m |  sum
cluster={{cluster}} metric=up job=*dns* | quantize 2m |  sum
cluster={{cluster}}  metric=up job=apiserver | quantize 2m |  sum
cluster={{cluster}}  metric=up job=kubelet | quantize 2m |  sum
cluster={{cluster}} metric=up job=kube-state-metrics | quantize 2m |  sum
cluster={{cluster}}  metric=up  job=node-exporter | quantize 2m |  sum
cluster={{cluster}} metric=up (job=*prom*) | quantize 2m |  sum
metric=prometheus_remote_storage_failed_samples_total cluster={{cluster}} | rate
metric=prometheus_remote_storage_succeeded_samples_total cluster={{cluster}} | rate
metric=prometheus_remote_storage_succeeded_samples_total cluster={{cluster}} | rate
metric=prometheus_remote_storage_pending_samples | rate
metric=up cluster={{cluster}} | quantize 2m | sum by job, instance, endpoint| topk(500,max)
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs* metric=kube_statefulset_status_replicas | quantize using max

(cluster={{cluster}} _source=events )
| where %"object.message" matches /.*Liveness probe failed.*/
| where %"object.involvedobject.name" matches /.*sumologic-otelcol-logs.*/
| where !(%"object.involvedobject.name" matches /.*sumologic-otelcol-logs-collector.*/)
| timeslice 1m | count by _timeslice | fillmissing timeslice

(cluster={{cluster}} _source=events )
| where %"object.message" matches /.*Readiness probe failed.*/
| where %"object.involvedobject.name" matches /.*sumologic-otelcol-logs.*/
| where !(%"object.involvedobject.name" matches /.*sumologic-otelcol-logs-collector.*/)
| timeslice 1m | count by _timeslice | fillmissing timeslice

cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs* metric=container_memory_working_set_bytes 
| quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster, pod

cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs* metric=container_cpu_usage_seconds_total | rate increasing | quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs* metric=container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total | rate increasing
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs* metric=otelcol_exporter_queue_size | quantize 1m using avg  | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod

(cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}}) statefulset=/.*sumologic-otelcol-logs.*/ "502 Bad Gateway"
| timeslice 5m
| count as count by _timeslice,pod
| transpose row _timeslice column pod
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-metrics* metric=kube_statefulset_status_replicas | quantize using max

cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-metrics* metric=container_memory_working_set_bytes | quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod

cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-metrics* metric=container_cpu_usage_seconds_total | rate increasing | quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod

(cluster={{cluster}} _source=events )
| where %"object.message" matches /.*Liveness probe failed.*/
| where %"object.involvedobject.name" matches /.*sumologic-otelcol-metrics.*/
| timeslice 1m | count by _timeslice | fillmissing timeslice

(cluster={{cluster}} _source=events )
| where %"object.message" matches /.*Readiness probe failed.*/
| where %"object.involvedobject.name" matches /.*sumologic-otelcol-metrics.*/
| timeslice 1m | count by _timeslice | fillmissing timeslice
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-metrics* metric=otelcol_exporter_queue_size |quantize 1m using avg  | avg by container, pod | sum by pod

(cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}}) statefulset=/.*sumologic-otelcol-metrics.*/ "502 Bad Gateway"
| timeslice 5m
| count as count by _timeslice,pod
| transpose row _timeslice column pod
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}} statefulset=*sumologic-otelcol-metrics* metric=container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total | rate increasing

cluster={{cluster}} metric= otelcol_process_memory_rss (pod=*trace* or pod=*instrumentation* )
| quantize 1m using avg  | avg by container, pod | sum by pod

cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}}
 daemonset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs-collector _contentType="Prometheus" cluster=* metric=up | quantize to 1h using max | sum by cluster,namespace,daemonset

panels.title: Otelcol Logs Pipeline Serious Log Errors

queries.queryString:
cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}}  daemonset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs-collector  metric=container_memory_working_set_bytes 
| quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod

cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}}  daemonset=*sumologic-otelcol-logs-collector  metric=container_cpu_usage_seconds_total | rate increasing | quantize 1m using avg | avg by cluster,container, pod | sum by cluster,pod

panels.title: Serious Queue Log Events For Otelcol Logs Containers

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*otelcol* cluster={{cluster}} namespace={{namespace}}
( warn or error or fatal) //not unmarshal
("No more retries" or "sender failed" or "Dropping data" or "max elapsed time expired" or "sending_queue is full")
| json field=_raw "log" 
| parse field=log "*\t*\t*:*\t*\t*" as datetime,level,file,line,error_type,details nodrop	
| where level matches /warn|error|fatal/
| parse regex field=log "(?<some_json>\{.+\})" nodrop
//| json field=some_json "action" nodrop
| json field=some_json "error" nodrop
//| json field=some_json "data_type" nodrop
//| json field=some_json "name" nodrop
| json field=some_json "kind" nodrop
| json field=some_json "pipeline" nodrop
| if (length(error)>200,concat(substring(error,0,200),"..."),error) as error
| count by cluster,level,file,error_type,error,kind,pipeline |sort _count

panels.title: Serious Queue Log Events For Otelcol Logs Containers
